code: import React from'react';import"./Signup.css";var checkPassword=function checkPassword(password){if(password.length>0){var passwordInformation={score:0,hasLowerCase:false,hasUpperCase:false,hasNumber:false,hasNonAlphaNumeric:false,isOver8Char:false,isOver12Char:false};var chars=password.split('');chars.forEach(function(char){if(/\d/.test(char)){passwordInformation.hasNumber=true;}if(/[a-z]/.test(char)){passwordInformation.hasLowerCase=true;}if(/[A-Z]/.test(char)){passwordInformation.hasUpperCase=true;}if(/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/.test(char)){passwordInformation.hasNonAlphaNumeric=true;}if(chars.length>8){passwordInformation.isOver8Char=true;}if(chars.length>12){passwordInformation.isOver12Char=true;}});for(var property in passwordInformation){if(passwordInformation[property]===true){passwordInformation.score+=1;}}if(passwordInformation.score<=5){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"password-strength required"},"Use 8 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers & symbols.");}else{return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"password-strength valid"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("i",{className:"fas fa-check"}));}}};export default checkPassword;
